text: I'd probably use the form submission API with AJAX on the page: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>
I just started in HubSpot, Need some guidelines and resources.

Yes, definitely something we’re exploring and want to do. We want to make the entire KB much more flexible, not only so you can add scripts into the header (or footer), but also so you can fully customize template styling and edit inline source code if you want to. It’s going to be a really big project and I don’t know when it will happen, but it’s very high on the KB wish list :slightly_smiling_face:
